title: FastChainSync: Task exception was never retrieved
body:
### What is wrong?

```
   INFO  06-20 10:48:36       chain  Imported 192 headers in 1.56 seconds, new head: #459119 (d25e4e)
   ERROR  06-20 10:48:37  base_events  Task exception was never retrieved
future: <Task finished coro=<FastChainSyncer.sync() done, defined at /home/cburgdorf/Documents/hacking/ef/py-evm/p2p/chain.py:121> exception=NoConnectedPeers()>
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/cburgdorf/Documents/hacking/ef/py-evm/p2p/chain.py", line 134, in sync
    await self._sync(peer)
  File "/home/cburgdorf/Documents/hacking/ef/py-evm/p2p/chain.py", line 183, in _sync
    head_number = await self._process_headers(peer, headers)
  File "/home/cburgdorf/Documents/hacking/ef/py-evm/p2p/chain.py", line 242, in _process_headers
    'receipt')
  File "/home/cburgdorf/Documents/hacking/ef/py-evm/p2p/chain.py", line 280, in _download_block_parts
    pending_replies = request_func(target_td, missing)
  File "/home/cburgdorf/Documents/hacking/ef/py-evm/p2p/chain.py", line 355, in request_receipts
    return self._request_block_parts(target_td, headers, self._send_get_receipts)
  File "/home/cburgdorf/Documents/hacking/ef/py-evm/p2p/chain.py", line 320, in _request_block_parts
    peers = self.peer_pool.get_peers(target_td)
  File "/home/cburgdorf/Documents/hacking/ef/py-evm/p2p/peer.py", line 769, in get_peers
    raise NoConnectedPeers()
p2p.exceptions.NoConnectedPeers
```

### How can it be fixed

¯\_(ツ)_/¯
